altTitles.ja: はじめてのおふぱこっ♪
高校時代に振ったマネージャーがレベチ陽キャになっていた件

altTitles.ja-ro: Koko Jidai ni Futta Manager ga Rebechi hi Kya ni Natte ita Ken

altTitles.en: When The Manager I Dumped in High School Got a Total Glow-Up

description.en:
1. Okaerinasai Darling (おかえりなさいダーリン); Comic Market 97
2. Ero Mangaka AV Debut!? (エロ漫画家AVデビュー!？)
3. Koko Jidai ni Futta Manager ga Rebechi hi Kya ni Natte ita Ken (高校時代に振ったマネージャーがレベチ陽キャになっていた件); COMIC1☆22
4. Datte Suki Dakara (だって好きだから); COMIC ExE 01
5. Love Letter wo Kimi ni (ラブレターを君に); COMIC ExE 07
6. Motto Watashi wo Chitte Hoshii (もっと私を痴ってほしい); COMIC ExE 13
7. Hajimete no Off-Pako♪ (はじめてのおふぱこっ♪); COMIC ExE 14
As there’s a cosplay event going on in Ikebukuro, Hirotake checks Twitter to see what’s up. He finds a user looking to hookup offline, and to his surprise that very user is right in front of him.
8. Ganbare Koisuru Izumi-chan (がんばれ恋するいずみちゃん); COMIC ExE 19
9. Ero Mangaka AV Satsuei (エロ漫画家AVさつえいっ); COMIC ExE 46
